name: Foam Roller Thoracic Extension
desc: Roller under mid-back. Hands behind head. Lean back over the roller. Breathe.

name: Foam Roller Lats Smash
desc: Lie on your side with the roller in your armpit. Roll up and down slowly.

name: Foam Roller Glute Roll
desc: Sit on the roller. Cross one ankle over the knee. Lean into the side of the top leg.

name: Foam Roller Quad Roll
desc: Lie face down with the roller under your thighs. Use your arms to move back and forth.

name: Foam Roller Adductor Roll
desc: Lie on your stomach. Place one leg out to the side with the roller under the inner thigh.

name: Foam Roller IT Band Smash
desc: Side-lying. Roller on the side of the thigh. Move from hip to just above the knee.

name: Foam Roller Calf Roll
desc: Sit with legs out. Roller under calves. Lift hips and move back and forth.

name: Foam Roller Shin Roll
desc: On all fours. Roller under shins. Roll from ankle to just below the knee.

name: Foam Roller Hamstring Roll
desc: Sit on floor. Roller under hamstrings. Use hands to roll from glutes to knees.

name: Foam Roller Lower Back
desc: Support your weight with hands/feet. Gently roll the lower back. Stop if painful.

name: Lacrosse Ball Pec Smash
desc: Lean against a wall with the ball between the wall and your chest muscle.

name: Lacrosse Ball Upper Traps
desc: Lean against a wall. Ball between wall and the meaty part of your shoulder/neck.

name: Lacrosse Ball Glute Medius
desc: Side of the hip. Find the tender spot with the ball and sink your weight in.

name: Lacrosse Ball Posterior Capsule
desc: Lie on your back. Ball behind the shoulder blade. Move your arm across your body.

name: Lacrosse Ball Foot Arch Smash
desc: Stand on the ball. Roll from heel to toes. Apply pressure.

name: Lacrosse Ball T-Spine Peanut
desc: Two balls together. Lie on them so they sit on either side of your spine.

name: Lacrosse Ball Forearm Release
desc: Place ball on table. Press forearm into it and move your wrist in circles.

name: Lacrosse Ball Jaw Release
desc: Hold ball in hand. Gently rub the jaw muscle in circular motions.

name: Lacrosse Ball Bicep Smash
desc: Ball between your arm and a wall. Lean in and rotate your palm.

name: Lacrosse Ball TFL Release
desc: Ball on the front-side of your hip. Lie face down and breathe.

name: Banded Shoulder Dislocates
desc: Hold band wide. Arms straight. Bring it over your head to your lower back.

name: Banded Face Pulls
desc: Anchor band at eye level. Pull toward your forehead, pulling the band apart.

name: Banded Pull-Aparts
desc: Hold band in front of chest. Pull arms out to the sides.

name: Banded Hip Distraction
desc: Anchor band to a post. Loop around hip. Step back to create tension. Lunge.

name: Banded Ankle Mobilization
desc: Band around ankle joint. Anchor behind you. Drive knee forward.

name: Banded Overhead Lat Stretch
desc: Anchor band high. Loop hand through. Let the band pull your shoulder.

name: Banded Hamstring Stretch
desc: Lie on back. Loop band around foot. Pull leg toward you.

name: Banded Hip Flexor Stretch
desc: Lunge position. Band pulls hip forward from behind. Squeeze glute.

name: Banded No-Money Stretch
desc: Elbows at sides, palms up. Rotate hands out away from each other.

name: Banded Cat-Cow
desc: Band across your back, held by hands. Perform Cat-Cow against resistance.

name: Banded External Rotation
desc: Anchor at waist height. Pull band away from your body, elbow at 90.

name: Banded Internal Rotation
desc: Anchor at waist height. Pull band across your stomach, elbow tucked.

name: Banded Monster Walk
desc: Band around ankles. Half-squat. Step sideways with tension.

name: Banded Clamshells
desc: Band around knees. Lie on side, knees bent. Lift top knee.

name: Banded Bird-Dog
desc: Loop band around foot and opposite hand. Extend both.

name: Banded Psoas March
desc: Band around feet. Lie on back. Pull one knee to chest.

name: Banded Shoulder Press
desc: Stand on band. Press arms overhead. Full reach at the top.

name: Banded Good Mornings
desc: Stand on band, loop over neck. Hinge at hips. Stretch hamstrings.

name: Banded Tricep Extensions
desc: Anchor high. Pull band down, locking out elbows.

name: Banded Wall Slides
desc: Loop band around wrists. Perform wall slides, pushing out against band.

name: Kettlebell Windmill
desc: KB held overhead. Hinge hip out and touch the floor with free hand.

name: Kettlebell Goblet Squat Hold
desc: Hold KB at chest. Deep squat. Use elbows to push knees apart.

name: Kettlebell Halo
desc: Hold KB upside down. Circle it around your head close to your neck.

name: Kettlebell Bottoms-Up Press
desc: Hold KB upside down. Press slowly. Forces shoulder stability.

name: Kettlebell Around the World
desc: Stand tall. Pass the KB around your waist hand to hand.

name: Kettlebell Figure 8
desc: Half-squat. Pass KB between and around legs in a figure-8.

name: Kettlebell Prying Lunge
desc: Lunge position. Hold KB inside front leg. Move hips in circles.

name: Kettlebell Straight Leg Deadlift
desc: Hold KB with both hands. Hinge at hips with straight legs.

name: Kettlebell Arm Bar
desc: Lie on back, press KB up. Roll onto your side, keep arm vertical.

name: Dumbbell Cuban Press
desc: Upright row to 90, rotate weights up, then press. Great for shoulders.

name: Dumbbell Chest Supported Row
desc: Lie face down on incline bench. Pull weights back, squeezing shoulder blades.

name: Dumbbell Pullover
desc: Lie on bench. Hold one DB with both hands. Lower behind head, then pull back up.

name: Dumbbell Wrist Curls
desc: Rest forearm on thigh. Curl weight up with wrist. Then flip for extensions.

name: Dumbbell Goblet Lateral Lunge
desc: Hold DB at chest. Step wide and sink into one hip. Keep other leg straight.

name: Stick Shoulder Pass-Throughs
desc: Hold stick wide. Keep arms straight. Rotate from hips to behind the back.

name: Stick Overhead Squat
desc: Hold stick wide overhead. Squat deep while keeping stick behind ears.

name: Stick Good Mornings
desc: Stick across shoulders. Hinge at hips with flat back. Stretch hamstrings.

name: Stick Side Leans
desc: Hold stick overhead. Lean to one side, pushing stick away to stretch the lat.

name: Stick Behind Back Rotation
desc: Stick behind back, hooked in elbows. Rotate torso left and right slowly.

name: Bench T-Spine Extension
desc: Elbows on bench, hands behind head. Drop head and chest toward the floor.

name: Bench Hip Flexor Stretch
desc: One foot back on bench, other leg forward. Drop hips down and tuck pelvis.

name: Bench Pigeon Stretch
desc: Place one leg 'ã„±' shape on the bench. Lean forward to stretch the glute.

name: Bench Dip Shoulder Stretch
desc: Sit on edge. Hands on bench. Slide off and let shoulders stretch in extension.

name: Bench Single Leg Squat
desc: Stand in front of bench. Squat on one leg until butt touches bench.

name: Doorway Bicep Stretch
desc: Hand on frame, thumb down. Turn away from the arm. Stretch bicep/chest.

name: Doorway Overhead Stretch
desc: Both hands high on frame. Lean your chest through the door.

name: Doorway Single Arm Row
desc: Hold frame. Lean back and pull yourself in. Focus on shoulder blade.

name: Towel Neck Pull
desc: Towel behind neck. Pull ends forward while pushing head back into it.

name: Towel Shoulder Stretch
desc: One hand over shoulder, one behind back. Use towel to pull hands together.

name: Towel Foot Crunch
desc: Sit down. Use toes to scrunch up a towel on the floor. Foot mobility.

name: Yoga Block Adductor Squeeze
desc: Place block between knees. Squeeze and hold while lying on your back.

name: Yoga Block Calf Raise
desc: Stand with balls of feet on block. Drop heels low, then press high.

name: Yoga Block Supported Fish
desc: Block under mid-back, another under head. Lie back and open chest.

name: Barbell Quad Smash
desc: Sit on floor. Roll a barbell over your quads like a heavy rolling pin.

name: Barbell Adductor Smash
desc: Lie on stomach. Place end of barbell on inner thigh and breathe.

name: Barbell Forearm Smash
desc: Rest forearm on a bench. Roll the barbell over it to release tension.

name: Box Step-Up with High Knee
desc: Step up on box. Drive opposite knee to chest. Focus on stability.

name: Box Glute Stretch
desc: Similar to pigeon stretch but on a higher surface. Lean in deep.

name: Box Deep Squat
desc: Squat with heels on the edge of a low box. Helps with upright posture.

name: Wall-Supported Hip Airplanes
desc: Hand on wall. Stand on one leg. Rotate your hips open and closed.

name: Wall-Supported Calf Raise
desc: Leaning against wall. Single leg calf raises. Focus on full range.

name: Wall Finger Walks
desc: Stand side to wall. Use fingers to 'walk' your arm as high as possible.

name: Medicine Ball Chest Smash
desc: Lie face down on the ball, placing it on your pec. Roll around.

name: Medicine Ball Russian Twists
desc: Sit, feet up. Move ball side to side. Focus on thoracic rotation.

name: Medicine Ball Overhead Reach
desc: Hold ball. Reach high and slightly back. Stretch front chain.

name: Suspension Trainer Chest Stretch
desc: Hold handles. Lean forward into a 'T' or 'Y' shape. Deep chest stretch.

name: Suspension Trainer Hip Drop
desc: Stand side to anchor. Handles overhead. Drop hips away from anchor.

name: Suspension Trainer Low Row
desc: Lean back. Pull yourself up. Focus on retracting shoulder blades.

name: Step-Down (Heel Touch)
desc: Stand on a step. Lower one foot to touch floor with heel. Control knee.

name: Step Calf Stretch
desc: Heel off the edge. Let gravity pull the heel down. Hold for 30s.

name: Mini-Band Shoulder Pulses
desc: Band around wrists. Arms straight in front. Pulse outward quickly.

name: Mini-Band Glute Kickbacks
desc: Band around ankles. Kick one leg back. Squeeze glute at top.

name: Mini-Band Lateral Shuffles
desc: Band around knees. Stay low. Take wide steps to the side.

name: Sandbag Shoulder Clean
desc: Lift bag to one shoulder. Squat. Switch shoulders. Forces stability.

name: Sandbag Bear Hug Squat
desc: Hug bag to chest. Squat deep. Bag pulls you forward, keeping you upright.

name: Slant Board Squat
desc: Squat on the board (toes up or down). Targets ankle/knee.

name: Slant Board Calf Stretch
desc: Stand on board (toes up). Lean forward. Intense calf stretch.

name: Parallel Bar Support Hold
desc: Push yourself up. Hold with straight arms. Depress shoulders.

name: Parallel Bar L-Sit Tuck
desc: In support hold, tuck knees to chest. Hold. Hip flexor strength.

name: Pull-Up Bar Passive Hang
desc: Just hang. Let gravity decompress spine and stretch lats.
